title: ASX set for heavy losses; Bitcoin plunges, crypto market in ‘full capitulation mode’
description: Sharp drops hit Wall Street on Thursday as technology stocks fell and bitcoin plunged again to roughly half its record price set last year.

title: Bitcoin Price Plunges Below $70,000 as Volatility Roars Back
description: Bitcoin's price slid sharply today, falling to roughly the high‑$69,000 range as a wave of selling pressure hit the broader crypto market and erased tens of billions of dollars in value from the world's largest digital asset.

title: Crypto rout deepens, bitcoin slides nearly 50% from its record high
description: Crypto rout deepens, bitcoin slides nearly 50% from its record high

source.name: Investing.com | Stock Market Quotes & Financial News

title: ASX set for heavy losses; Bitcoin plunges, crypto market in ‘full capitulation mode’
description: Sharp drops hit Wall Street on Thursday as technology stocks fell and bitcoin plunged again to roughly half its record price set last year.

title: Bitcoin nears $70,000 amid crypto market slide
description: Bitcoin edged dangerously close to the key $70,000 level on Thursday as the world’s largest cryptocurrency continued its steep decline, signaling increased caution among investors and fragile market sentiment. The digital currency fell more than 3% in the Asian session, reaching $70,052.38, its lowest price since November 2024, while Ether dropped nearly 2% to $2,086.11, […]
